fontSize.$description: Base font size for accessibility theme. Larger size for better readability and accessibility compliance.

default.$description: Strong border color for maximum contrast in accessibility theme. Dark and highly visible for accessibility needs.

disabled.$description: More visible disabled text (was 500, now 700 for better contrast)

muted.$description: More visible muted background (was 50, now 200 for better contrast)

small.$description: Smaller than default. Still visible but more subtle than baseline in friendly theme.

default.$description: Baseline for accessibility theme. Shifted up from minimal (4px) for softer, friendlier aesthetic. Standard components use this.

large.$description: Larger than default. Used for cards, panels. Hierarchical: default (8px) < large (10px) for nested aesthetics.

extra-large.$description: Much larger than default. Used for modals, dialogs. Clear hierarchy: default (8px) < large (10px) < extra-large (12px).
